sections.title: Vocabulary
sections.instructions: Choose the best answer for each vocabulary question.

questions.text: Which is the correct meaning of 「おはよう」?
questions.explanation: 「おはよう」is used to say 'good morning' in Japanese.

sections.title: Grammar
sections.instructions: Select the correct grammar pattern or particle to complete each sentence.

questions.explanation: The particle は is used to mark the topic of the sentence.

questions.text: きのう＿＿＿えいがをみました。
questions.explanation: The particle に is used to indicate time in this sentence.

sections.title: Reading
sections.instructions: Read the passage and answer the questions that follow.

questions.text:
わたしはマリーです。にほんごをべんきょうしています。にほんごはたのしいです。

What is the person studying?
questions.explanation: The text states 'にほんごをべんきょうしています' which means 'I am studying Japanese.'
